document.title: Van Kampen Corpus
document.intro: The van Kampen corpus is based on tapings of two Dutch girls. Laura was studied from the age of 1;9.18 to 5;10.9 and Sarah from 1;6.16 to 6;0. The child’s age at each session is given inside each file. The recordings were made roughly once or twice every month by the mother of the child...
